Risk_of_Bias: Low - randomized with random number tables, blinded CT assessment
Diagnostic_Criteria: Single small (<20mm) enhancing CT lesion with seizures <3 months duration
Control_Group_N: Not applicable - three active treatment arms
Focal_Seizures_Percentage: 63.6% complex partial, 21.9% partial with secondary generalization, 15.5% simple partial
Treatment_Type: S: Prednisolone; A: Albendazole; SA: Both
Corticosteroid_Type: Prednisolone 2 mg/kg/day (3 weeks + taper in S group, 1 week in SA group)
Comments: No significant difference in lesion resolution between groups. Steroid-only group had significantly more seizure recurrences. Combined therapy (SA) may be better option than steroids alone.
